articleHtml:
Note: All times local

London, United Kingdom

12:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the lying-in-state of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II.

Westminster Hall

Note for media:

  • Host broadcaster and photographer coverage

12:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will sign the book of condolences for Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II.

Lancaster House

Note for media:

  • Host broadcaster and photographer coverage

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will have an audience with His Majesty King Charles III.

Buckingham Palace
